channel.title: [PI]Making weapon spec stronger+fixing high HP NPCs
channel.description:
How do I make the spec of a weapon stronger(but not the weapon itself)? This is for the Korasi's sword and the Dd.
Second problem is NPC hp. My server does not have x10 hits and I found out that for correct HP bars the max HP allowed for an NPC is 255. If I set the HP higher, the bar on the NPC will go down as it takes damage as if it had 100 hp. After that is drained it would just have 0% HP until it was dealt it's hitpoints. How can I fix that?
Thanks :)

item.title: [PI]Making weapon spec stronger+fixing high HP NPCs
item.dc:creator: @polkaman polkaman
item.description:
@polkaman wrote:

Shadowspkin:

Change the formula in combatAssist <-- Think I spelled that wrong im off terms but you get the idea. For high hp should be in npc.cfg

I know how to make the HP higher, but the HP bar on the NPC is messed up.

Read full topic
item.source: [PI]Making weapon spec stronger+fixing high HP NPCs
